title: How many products are sold on Amazon category wise? - Quora

response.answer_text: The short answer? A lot. On Amazon, there are around 27 departments. Each of those categories is filled with subcategories. For example, a toothbrush falls under the “Beauty and Personal Care” department, but can also be found in the “Oral Care Products” subcategory, as well as many others. The exact number of products is changing every day. If you’re a seller looking to find your next big product to sell, I’d recommend vetting your ideas through a product research tool like Algopix. Algopix is great because it shows you a lot of actionable data about the products you are interested in selling. You can use it to see things like: - Demand and competition levels - Estimated profit and expenses - Average monthly sales - Seller ratings and reviews - Relevant Google Adwords data With so many products for sale, you need this kind of information to be competitive. That way you don’t get lost in the sea of 300+ million items.

There are 34 Departments. on Amazon. The number of items sold in each of them of varies daily.  There are currently no single departments for Home & Garden (it's now Home & Kitchen), Home Theater and A/V (Movies & TV) and Watches (across different categories). As of today (May 8th, 2016). The numbers sold in the mentioned departments is the following: Sports & Outdoors: 24,355,389 Home & Kitchen: 63,581,171 Movies & TV: 1,397,835  A search for "watches" returns 2,133,409 results.
